com.marklogic.hub.impl

Class HubConfigBuilderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.hub.impl.HubConfigBuilderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HubConfigBuilder

    public class HubConfigBuilderImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements HubConfigBuilder
    A class for building a HubConfig class. Create a HubConfig instance like so: 
    
     HubConfig hubConfig = HubConfigBuilder.newHubConfigBuilder("/path/to/your/project")
         .withPropertiesFromEnvironment("local")
         .build();

      • withProperties

        public HubConfigBuilder withProperties(java.util.Properties properties)
        Description copied from interface: HubConfigBuilder
        Tells the builder to use the given properties. If properties are also being loaded from the gradle files in the project dir, then these properties will be merged into the others taking precedence over the ones loaded from disk
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
